content:
I'll likely use some of the free tools you mentioned earlier, such as Google Keyword Planner, Ubersuggest, and LSIGraph. For on-page optimization, I'll review my website's technical aspects using tools like Google PageSpeed Insights, GTmetrix, and Screaming Frog. I'll also make sure to optimize my website's meta tags, titles, and descriptions using a plugin like Yoast SEO.

By the way, I've been meaning to ask: do you have any recommendations for creating high-quality, engaging content that resonates with my target audience? I know content creation is a crucial aspect of SEO optimization, and I want to make sure I'm creating content that drives results.
